name: React Native Lead Developer
description:
Alecton is a digital money management company that aims to improve financial experience and contribute to global challenges related to creating transparent financial infrastructure. It fosters the adoption of digital money and builds a range of technological solutions.

The company was established to provide a range of technological solutions and services to the younger generation and educate them, offering alternatives to outdated, centralized, bureaucratic ways of managing finance.

Leading position

Please pay attention that we are looking for a lead developer that’s why your expected responsibilities are:

  • Hiring a team for further development according to the roadmap
  • Technical leadership and people management experience, and proven ability to coach others resulting in a significant improvement of their capabilities
  • Be a proactive person with a hands-on mentality who is not afraid of challenges
  • English language is desirable but not required

Qualifications:

  • Education in Computer Science or equivalent experience
  • 4+ years of professional Front End development (React)
  • at least 1 year of professional React Native development experience in mobile development
  • Experience in using RESTful APIs to integrate mobile applications to server side systems and an understanding of the document request model.
  • A strong understanding of professional software engineering best practices for the full SDLC, including CI/CD
  • Strong understanding of mobile app development lifecycle
  • Good experience in deploying the applications on Apple App Store and Google Play Store

Remote work or relocation:

  • Our team is distributed in the USA, Cyprus, Turkey, the Netherlands, so you can choose to work remotely or closer to any of the other teammates.
  • Remote payroll options are available globally.
